title: velocity rules
extract: Quantity Velocity Rule. The function of the quantity velocity rule is similar to the amount velocity rule, except instead of checking the amount, this will check the quantity in the orders against the pre-set threshold.May 26, 2017
extract_html: Quantity Velocity Rule. The function of the quantity velocity rule is similar to the amount velocity rule, except instead of checking the amount, this will check the quantity in the orders against the pre-set threshold.May 26, 2017
